channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Been tipped out, 24th November
item.description:
Someone went down Clapton passage lifting all bin lids and apparently tipping one out. Waste all over passage

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Passage, Hackney, London

item.title: Lamppost and bollard lights all out on roundabout., 24th November
item.description:
At this junction there is a raised roundabout. All the lights on this roundabout are out. This includes the lamppost light on top and the four bollard lights around it. Due to this it is hard to see when approaching, if someone is travelling too fast they may crash into it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blackfen, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing public litter bins, 24th November
item.description:
X3 bins are overflowing with litter, the entire street is now full of litter because of this.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hoxton Market, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo and green waste in brown bin, 24th November
item.description:
There is a brown bin full of dog poo which I emptied, but I couldn’t empty it completely and I bagged it all up and it’s on the side of the road by the tree on North over I don’t know who did it. It’s not even my Brown Bin I’ve got my own Brown bin, thanks And it was a disgusting horrible job but I made it easier for the bin man to take it away, I don’t know who did this. This is graceful and disgusting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Northover, Downham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass for months on the footpath, 24th November
item.description:
There has been a large amount of broken glass on the pavement just before the scout hall and nursery where lots of children walk past. It’s dangerous and clearly the street sweeper hasn’t been along the footpath for months now.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bouverie Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Excessive number of Voi bikes spilling into parkings pays, 24th November
item.description:
A ridiculous number of Voi hire bikes are occupying the reduced number of parking spaces for cars - especially near local shops and a pharmacy. There are also bikes fallen over in the designated hire spaces. This is an excessive number of bikes and Voi should not have dumped so many bikes here. There are loads of cycling hire parking bays - the demand is not there so remove the bikes please and don't occupy parking spaces again!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Half Moon Lane, Dulwich Village, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned destroyed sofa and blinds on pavement, 24th November
item.description:

item.title: Refrigerator dumped yesterday 23/11/2025, 24th November
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Yorkton Street, Hackney, London
